title: Taming the Stallion
description: Carter Simmons harbors a long-held fantasy from his teen years of getting with a straight blonde cowboy with big brown eyes.  After he suffers a personal tragedy with his very first true love, Carter visits his brother in the mountains and meets the exact cowboy he dreamed of, Stetson Carthswaite.  After spending some time around Stetson, Carter realizes he might just get the shot at making his fantasy of converting a straight alpha male a reality.  This is a 10,000 word short-story with hot MM action between straight alpha male and a slim, frightened young man.  Download now to experience raw, aggressive, unprotected sex from an unsuspecting straight cowboy who’s about to be converted!
author: Candy Collins
